source.b987d9d4: Climatic conditions depend on assorted factors. Temperature, sunshine and rain are few of them. According to the results obtained for these factors, we can say that sunshine depends on the maximum temperature at any day but is doesn’t depend on minimum temperature or rain. If we talk about rain, there is slight dependency on minimum temperature but no dependency of maximum temperature and sunshine was found using Pearson test. Moreover, along with temperatures, rain and sun, if we would have taken other factors into account, the results produced above could have been slightly better.
